Blue
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Assorted Non-Monster Rancher Fiction: Blue
By Anonymous on Sunday, January 11, 2004 - 04:39 pm:

Blue

I'm blue,
She's blue,
And he's blue too.
I live in a house with
blue parents,
And I go to school with my friends and they're
all
blue too.

We may drive
different
cars
and listen to
different
music
and wear
different
clothes,
but we all still
getalong.

We disagree on many things, but
we all agree on
one
thing.
We
hate
them.
The ones
over...
there.
Them. They look so
ugly.
They're not blue!
They are
navy colored.
Not blue at all.

Don't be fooled.
At first they may
seem like us,
But
they're
not.
They may drive the
same
cars
and listen to the
same
music
and wear the
same
clothes
but they're nothing
likeus.
They're navy!
And I hate
Them.
